job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Computer Software,Financial Services
job.description:
If you are a Site Reliability Engineer with experience, please read on!      Top Reasons to Work with Us      We are an up and coming SAAS company, providing time tracking and management tools for major global players! We provide solutions for clients like Boeing, Disney, Volkswagen, Oracle, Hulu and Office Depot. Come be a part of something great!      What You Will Be Doing     -  Develop and maintain tools for deployment/cluster management   
  -  Ensure reliability by responding to outages and supporting/resolving technical issues   
  -  Support our developers with CI/CD management   
  -  Debugging      
What You Need for this Position      Ideally 5 Years Of Experience With The Following     -  Managing AWS production systems   
  -  GCP experience   
  -  Microservices experience w/ Kubernetes   
  -  Python and Golang for progamming   
  -  Ansible and Terraform   
  -  Git/Version Control experience   
  -  Build tools like Maven and Gradle   
  -  Docker containerization   
  -  RabbitMQ   
  -  Datadog      
What's In It for You     -  Competitive base salary ($100-130k)   
  -  Unlimited vacation   
  -  Great benefits plan (health, dental, vision)   
  -  Remote work!      
So, if you are a Site Reliability Engineer with experience, please apply today!      Colorado employees will receive paid sick leave. For additional information about available benefits, please contact Joe Kipp      Email Your Resume In Word To      Looking forward to receiving your resume through our website and going over the position with you. Clicking apply is the best way to apply, but you may also:      Joe.Kipp@Optello.com     - Please do NOT change the email subject line in any way. You must keep the JobID: linkedin : JK12-1655625 -- in the email subject line for your application to be considered.***      
Joe Kipp - Recruiter - Optello      Applicants must be authorized to work in the U.S.      Optello is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer      All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law.      Your Right to Work - In compliance with federal law, all persons hired will be required to verify identity and eligibility to work in the United States and to complete the required employment eligibility verification document form upon hire.
